Scripts.OnClick: if ZGV.NotificationCenter then self:Hide() return end if ZGV.CreatureDetector.DetectedGuides then if #ZGV.CreatureDetector.DetectedGuides==1 then ZGV:SetGuide(ZGV.CreatureDetector.DetectedGuides[1].title) else ZGV.GuidePicker:NavigateTo("DETECTOR") end end
Scripts.OnHide: if ZGV.NotificationCenter then self:Hide() return end ZGV.CreatureDetector.DetectedGuides=nil
Scripts.OnLoad: if ZGV.NotificationCenter then self:Hide() return end self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp","RightButtonUp") self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_TARGET_CHANGED")
Scripts.OnEnter: if ZGV.NotificationCenter then self:Hide() return end ZGV.CreatureDetector:ShowTooltip(self)
Scripts.OnLeave: if ZGV.NotificationCenter then self:Hide() return end GameTooltip:Hide()
